## Calculate weighted scores  
$$(WR)=R\frac{v}{v+m}+C\frac{m}{v+m}$$

#### v = Number of reviews

#### m = Minimum reviews in 90th percentile

#### R = Average rating

#### C = Mean of rating

## Results

1. Half Dome Trail (score = 4.787283)

2. Vernal and Nevada Falls via the Mist Trail (score = 4.740623)
